website_summaries.verdict: Reminiscent of a fondu pot, this option is fun for kids and adults alike, although it may take a few pizzas to really get the hang of it.
pros: Fun for family get-togethers and parties
Takes five minutes to heat up, 10 minutes to cook
Fits up to six small pizzas at a time
Easy to set up and clean
cons: Takes some trial and error to get a good pizza out of it
Some buyers say this option doesn't cook pizzas evenly

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Pretty simple to execute
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pretty simple to execute. Wish I could get more toppings on them without spilling, but still great fun. Advice: simply take new dough discs off the stack and set them exposed when you make each round. Flip them to put the dry side down when you build them. This way they slide off easy.
customer_reviews.author: redwine77

customer_reviews.title: ... my Pizzarette for the first time last night and LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Just used my Pizzarette for the first time last night and LOVE it!! The unit itself is really well-made, with a great design. My friends and I had so much fun using the Pizzarette because we could all sit around my table, enjoy our wine, make our own pizza, and no one was stuck cooking in the kitchen! Since everyone can choose their own ingredients, even my picky-eater friends enjoyed it. One tip- (as with all pizza dough) it's always good to let the dough sit for a few minutes, or spray the unit with some light cooking spray to prevent sticking. Excited to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Give 4  metal Spatulas forget the plastic ones
customer_reviews.text: Use it for making pizza Did not like the plastic Pizza server. The metal one is great should come with metal ones not plastic. I have one that is 10 years old. So bought this one for my daughter birthday present. On the old one you can push the pizza in farther so we cooked all around on the one I just bought a pizza can’t go in all the way so you have to rotate it around that was the big difference I found but we still love it but take those black spatulas away and give the metal ones like you used to thank you
customer_reviews.author: debra plishka

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to clean, not too big to store! We've used it 3 times now. Just have to be sure you rotate the pizzas once or twice while cooking so they get cooked evenly. So fun.
customer_reviews.author: Taresa A McSpadden

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Pizzarette for a while now and I am so happy with this product. It has held up nicely after multiple uses and the pizza just keeps getting better and better! It's really unique and makes for a great group activity.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fun & delicious pizza!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza oven. Also glad I bought version with pizza stone. I am convinced this enhances the taste even though it requires a bit more care. Great for entertaining and seriously nice pizza's :)
customer_reviews.author: Pilar C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for a fun night with friends and family. Also my kids love using it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Scantland

customer_reviews.title: Really cool idea
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little long to heat up at first so make sure you warm it before you make your pizzas. Used this for a kids pizza making party and doing 4 at a time really made it easy. Definitely a machine we will use over and over at home.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Patzen

customer_reviews.title: Family must have!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this yesterday. We made our individual pizzas and it was awesome! It made our family dinner a little more interactive and fun. It absolutely works and I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Luna de la Fuente

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Tried out the Pizzarette for lunch today and it was much better than I expected! The pizzas, although very small, turned out great! The kids (ages 13 & 14) had so much fun making them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarafina I.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It is always such a hit with my guests!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A mistake
customer_reviews.text: It tuned out not to work for full size 12" frozen pizzas, which was what I wanted it for. My mistake, but I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara in Topeka

customer_reviews.title: It is fun at a party but you need to sort out ...
customer_reviews.text: It is fun at a party but you need to sort out your toppings and pizza crust...then watch closely as it cooks...some take longer than other...like anything you cook you need to be flexible and experiment.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: New fun way to cook pizzas.
customer_reviews.text: We love our Pizzarette.We received it in 2 days. It's like a commercial brick oven in the kitchen. Children love seeing their own pizzas cooking right in front of them.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the Pizzarette
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the Pizzarette! It is so easy to use, and you would have no idea that the pizza didn't come from a larger wood fired brick oven. It especially makes for a fun evening with my 2 nieces as they love to create and cook their own miniature pizzas. Would definitely recommend as a great gift to anyone, especially if you've got kids!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rosso

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was definetly fun for family dinner, pizza didn't cook evenly..... maybe prebakkng dough will help....
customer_reviews.author: guamgirl_671

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fun for kids on pizza night
customer_reviews.text: I expected a fuller sized pizza oven, but this one would only be good for English muffin-size pizzas. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's just like a toaster oven but bulky and hard to store.
customer_reviews.author: Malu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and her family. My daughter loves the pizza oven. It is good a quality pizza oven. it arrived ahead of schedule. Will order again from Table Top Chefs!
customer_reviews.author: Monica W

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend and I feel I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to put pizzas in and out. Makes a huge mess with flour necessary for sliding in and out. I do not recommend and I feel I wasted my money. Not worth the cost at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T Sedlick

customer_reviews.title: I love this pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza oven! Our whole family enjoys the delicious, homemade pizza, and we will be using this oven for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma9

customer_reviews.title: Buy one now! Kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: The pizzarette is the perfect ingredient to a fun family night. It makes absolutely perfect pizzas and our family had a blast making them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product....I wanted a way to have a fun dinner with the family....my kids 11-18 all loved it.....absolutely delicious pizzas....we use it at least once a week everyone gets to put their own toppings on so no pinapple juice ruining the olive pizza....makes for happy kids and parents....the only downfall is you are totally stuffed because you want to keep expirement with toppings as well as regular or Sicilian ....easy clean up make a happy mom!!!!......buy this and you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: denise roloph

customer_reviews.title: We have used it for a quick dinner with just the family and also it was the centerpiece for our Super Bowl party this year
customer_reviews.text: Everyone gathers around the Pizzarette while their individual personalized pizza's bake. We have used it for a quick dinner with just the family and also it was the centerpiece for our Super Bowl party this year. Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Fancy, easy to use, easy for party...
customer_reviews.author: harsh patel

customer_reviews.title: Set-up was super easy, all I had to do was take ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new 6 person classic the other day and couldn't wait to hook it up and get started making some pizzas over the weekend. Set-up was super easy, all I had to do was take out the packing materials and screw on the handle. It was pretty nice that it came already 95% assembled. I enjoyed that I could just cut out the dough and make several different pizzas with different toppings to match my mood.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family fun
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this after seeing a video on facebook. It's even more fun that the video looks! My kids love it, and it's a great activity for the family. Can't wait for them to publish a cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great family meal
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE THIS! What a fun time with family! The metal Pizza rounds are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H Wood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love concept of making individual pizzas, although they need to be smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: judith a colvin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is da bomb
customer_reviews.text: Such a great idea. Lots of fun with the kids and family. 💯👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Super Fun for the entire family! My daughters had a great time making mini pizzas and it was hilarious to watch them become "little chefs!". I attached a video of the ridiculousness. One tip that I would have is to make sure the kids don't overload the pizzas with toppings because they become a little top heavy when you try to put them into the oven....and have a good amount of flour on the spatula to help it slide into the oven. Overall, a great family playdate!
customer_reviews.author: David Wright

customer_reviews.title: Bought on a whim and loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My children and grandchildren love this! It really is a lot of fun and the pizza cooks beautifully. We bought refrigerated dough, thin crust, and had a lovely time. Just be careful of the heat and the cord and remember to have extra dough, as you might find yourself eating more than you expected.
customer_reviews.author: omgitsxme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got it for my wife for Christmas. She loves it, guests love it. I recommend buying four more of the metal spatulas because the dough tends to stick to the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three year old lightly used unit shorted out and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Had this for three years, enjoyed using it and cooking pizza with the family. We don’t use it that often however when I plugged It in last time the plug burst into flames and tripped the breaker. Something had shorted out inside the oven. Not sure what caused the issue. We store the pizza oven in the original box it came in and there was no visible damage to the oven and it looked in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: NRH

customer_reviews.title: My family loves it!!! Accessories became available ...
customer_reviews.text: My family loves it!!! Accessories became available at Tabletopchefs.com! I bought them too! Can't wait to try out the pans!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a family gift. We have enjoyed it twice so far. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: The pizzas cooked fine. They were small so, you just have to eat more of them
customer_reviews.author: J. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super-cool pizza oven! Great for family night with the kids - everyone can make their own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived early. Worked just as described. About 10 minutes to bake a piece pilled quite high. We used parchment paper under doug pieces while baking. Help reduce clean up. Very satisfied with product and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: We love it. We make the crust a little thinner ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We make the crust a little thinner than they recommend. So much fun for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Nut

customer_reviews.title: Great family product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea for family cooking interaction. Great idea. Great product. It bring family and kids together and closer.
customer_reviews.author: Mazen Bissat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks better than the ad. Haven't used it yet but so looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The unit was not new
customer_reviews.text: the package was used and opened and obviously not new. There was a long hair inside the opened box and one of the parts was greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason weber

product_meta.title: Pizzarette – “The World’s Funnest Pizza Oven” – 6 Person Model - Countertop Pizza Oven – Europe’s Best-Selling Tabletop Mini Pizza Oven Now Available In The USA – Dual Heating Elements
product_meta.description: Size:6 Person Pizzarette Pizza Oven6 person Pizzarette Classic pizza oven
feature_bullets: High power heating element means you are ready to cook in less than 5 minutes!
Pizzas only take 5-10 minutes to cook! Short cooking times allow you to enjoy the conversation and quickly try a variety of different toppings & combinations for your very own mini pizzas!
Dual heating elements above and below for fast and even cooking!
Removable cooking sheet is easy to clean, and the compact nature of the Pizzarette makes it easy to store! Looks like a piece of art on the kitchen counter!
Handmade Terracotta dome for exceptional flavor!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
